name: SHAPES (itch) (Binkey)
description:
This magnificent shape puzzle game will test your ability to crash the browse- I mean solve puzzles using the power of shape manipulation! Use A and D or left and right arrow keys to move your character left and right. Space bar allows you to jump. Click and drag to create a rectangle. If your less of a "be there or be square" type of guy, you can press "2" on the keyboard to switch to circles. "1" will switch your shapes back to square. There are a total of 3 simple levels in which you must conquer to call this game complete. Reach the start to complete each level. Challenge yourself to complete each puzzle with as little pieces as possible.

With the theme of "Game as Expression", SHAPES allows players to create the level to get to the finish. If this were a finished product, the levels would introduce unique puzzles allowing players to get really creative in the solving the puzzles.
